subtitle: This recipe gives baby sweetcorn and courgettes a tangy taste.

method.text: Melt the butter and in a pan. Fry the onion wedges for about 10 min until softened.
Add the courgettes and sweetcorn to the pan and fry for about 2-3 min, or until vegetables are just tender.
Add the vinegar and sugar. Cook for 2 min. Season to taste .

title: Saute vegetables with raspberry vinegar
